comments:
Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a new BPEL file using the synchronous template.
2. Drag an Assign operation onto the process between receiveInput and replyOutput.
3. View the Assign properties.  Create a new copy rule and select "variable to variable"
4. Attempt to map the input variable to the output variable.  You may have to expand the trees fully and click on several different nodes, but eventually the designer will display an error dialog with the following contents:

An error has occurred.  See error log for more details.
EMF object is not a BPEL resource.


More information:
